name: RegistryHelper
description: Comprehensive utility class for accessing and working with Minecraft's registry system.
overview:
The RegistryHelper class is a comprehensive utility class for accessing and working with Minecraft's registry system. It provides methods to retrieve items, blocks, enchantments, entities, status effects, and other game objects by their registry IDs, as well as methods to get lists of all registered objects of each type. This class serves as the main interface for script developers to look up and create instances of Minecraft game objects programmatically.

The RegistryHelper provides type-safe access to Minecraft's registries, allowing scripts to work with game objects using their string identifiers (like "minecraft:stone" or "diamond_sword") and convert them into appropriate helper objects that can be used in JSMacros scripts.

The RegistryHelper is typically accessed through a global API method.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Retrieves an item helper object by its registry ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The registry ID of the item (e.g., 'diamond_sword').

examples:
const diamondSword = registry.getItem("diamond_sword");
Chat.log(`Diamond sword max damage: ${diamondSword.getMaxDamage()}`);

methods.name: getItemStack
methods.description: Creates an item stack helper object from an ID and NBT data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The registry ID of the item.

methods.name: getItemIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered item IDs.

methods.name: getBlocks
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered block objects.
examples:
const blocks = registry.getBlocks();
Chat.log(`Total registered blocks: ${blocks.length}`);

methods.name: getBlockIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered block IDs.

methods.name: getBlockState
methods.description: Creates a block state helper from an ID and NBT/Property data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The registry ID of the block.

methods.name: getEntityTypeIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered entity type IDs.
examples:
const entityTypes = registry.getEntityTypeIds();
Chat.log(`Total entity types: ${entityTypes.length}`);

methods.name: getEntity
methods.description: Retrieves an entity helper object by its registry ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The registry ID of the entity.

methods.name: getEnchantments
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered enchantment objects.

methods.name: getEnchantmentIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered enchantment IDs.

methods.name: getEnchantment
methods.description: Retrieves an enchantment helper instance with a specific level.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The registry ID of the enchantment.

methods.name: getStatusEffects
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered status effect objects.
examples:
const effects = registry.getStatusEffects();
Chat.log(`Total status effects: ${effects.length}`);

methods.name: getStatusEffectIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered status effect IDs.

methods.name: getStatusEffect
methods.description: Retrieves a status effect helper object by its registry ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The registry ID of the status effect.

methods.name: getFeatureIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered feature IDs.

methods.name: getStructureFeatureIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered structure feature IDs.

methods.name: getPaintingIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered painting IDs.

methods.name: getParticleTypeIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered particle type IDs.

methods.name: getGameEventNames
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered game event names.

methods.name: getBlockEntityTypeIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered block entity type IDs.

methods.name: getScreenHandlerIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered screen handler IDs.

methods.name: getRecipeTypeIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered recipe type IDs.

methods.name: getVillagerTypeIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered villager type IDs.

methods.name: getVillagerProfessionIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered villager profession IDs.

methods.name: getEntityAttributeIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered entity attribute IDs.

methods.name: getPotionTypeIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all registered potion type IDs.
